summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 33rd Avenue West, from Clise Place to 32nd Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; property owners' petition, being City Comptroller's File No. 198123, to all in accordance with the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
